body_html:
Python 3.5 + CPU

Python 2.7 + CPU

Python 3.5 + CUDA

Python 2.7 + CUDA

Note, these .deb packages are really experimental. Use them at your own risk.

Usage:

$ sudo dpkg -i pythonXXXX.deb
$ sudo apt install -f  # this is to fix package dependency.

https://github.com/CDLuminate/pytorch-debs
https://github.com/cdluminate/pytorch

body:
[Python 3.5 + CPU](https://github.com/CDLuminate/pytorch-debs/raw/master/python3-torch-cpu_0.1.12~1_amd64.deb)

[Python 2.7 + CPU](https://github.com/CDLuminate/pytorch-debs/raw/master/python-torch-cpu_0.1.12~1_amd64.deb)

[Python 3.5 + CUDA](https://github.com/CDLuminate/pytorch-debs/raw/master/python3-torch-cuda_0.1.12~1_amd64.deb)

[Python 2.7 + CUDA](https://github.com/CDLuminate/pytorch-debs/raw/master/python-torch-cuda_0.1.12~1_amd64.deb)

Note, these .deb packages are  really **experimental**. Use them at your own risk.

Usage:
```
$ sudo dpkg -i pythonXXXX.deb
$ sudo apt install -f  # this is to fix package dependency.
```

https://github.com/CDLuminate/pytorch-debs
https://github.com/cdluminate/pytorch
